languages.text: Блюстители из разных частей корабля фон Валанциус докладывают об ужасающем зрелище: кожа некоторых членов экипажа стала прозрачной и обнажила пучки мышц и кровеносных сосудов под ней, между которыми копошились крохотные паукообразные насекомые, белесые и искрящиеся, как лед. Сами превращенные не заметили ни на себе, ни на других подобных явлений, лишь иногда жаловались на ледяные покалывания в руках и ногах. Некоторых из них уже линчевали как оскверненных, однако большинство дожили до выхода из варпа и вернули себе нормальный облик.

traits.locale_text: Блюстители из разных частей корабля фон Валанциус докладывают об ужасающем зрелище: кожа некоторых членов экипажа стала прозрачной и обнажила пучки мышц и кровеносных сосудов под ней, между которыми копошились крохотные паукообразные насекомые, белесые и искрящиеся, как лед. Сами превращенные не заметили ни на себе, ни на других подобных явлений, лишь иногда жаловались на ледяные покалывания в руках и ногах. Некоторых из них уже линчевали как оскверненных, однако большинство дожили до выхода из варпа и вернули себе нормальный облик.

languages.text: The enforcers from different decks of the von Valancius vessel report a terrifying sight: the skin of some crew members has become translucent, revealing knots of muscle and blood vessels beneath. Worse yet, small spider-like insects were seen scurrying inside of them, snow-white and sparkling like ice. The transformed could not see this phenomenon in themselves or anyone else, only occasionally complaining about a prickly feeling in their extremities. Some were branded as mutants and killed. The survivors reverted back after the vessel emerged in realspace.

Сами превращенные не заметили ни на себе, ни на других подобных явлений, лишь иногда жаловались на ледяные покалывания в руках и ногах. Некоторых из них уже линчевали как оскверненных, однако большинство дожили до выхода из варпа и вернули себе нормальный облик.

traits.locale_text: The enforcers from different decks of the von Valancius vessel report a terrifying sight: the skin of some crew members became translucent, revealing knots of muscle and blood vessels beneath. Worse yet, small spider-like insects were seen scurrying among them, snow-white and sparkling like ice. The transformed could not see this phenomenon in themselves or anyone else, only occasionally complaining about the prickly feeling in their extremities. Some were branded as mutants and killed, but the others survived and reverted back after the vessel emerged in the realspace.

The enforcers from different decks of the von Valancius vessel report a terrifying sight: the skin of some crew members became translucent, revealing knots of muscle and blood vessels beneath. Worse yet, small spider-like insects were seen scurrying among them, snow-white and sparkling like ice. The transformed could not see this phenomenon in themselves or anyone else, only occasionally complaining about the prickly feeling in their extremities. Some were branded as mutants and killed, but the others survived and reverted back after the vessel emerged in the realspace.

The transformed could not see this phenomenon in themselves or anyone else, only occasionally complaining about a prickly feeling in their extremities. Some were branded as mutants and killed. Worse yet, small spider-like insects were seen scurrying inside of them, snow-white and sparkling like ice. The transformed could not see this phenomenon in themselves or anyone else, only occasionally complaining about a prickly feeling in their extremities. Some were branded as mutants and killed. The survivors reverted back after the vessel emerged in realspace.

The enforcers from different decks of the von Valancius vessel report a terrifying sight: the skin of some crew members has become translucent, revealing knots of muscle and blood vessels beneath. Worse yet, small spider-like insects were seen scurrying inside of them, snow-white and sparkling like ice. The transformed could not see this phenomenon in themselves or anyone else, only occasionally complaining about a prickly feeling in their extremities. Some were branded as mutants and killed. The survivors reverted back after the vessel emerged in realspace.

languages.text: 舰船多层甲板的执法者都报告了同样可怕的景象：某些船员的皮肤变得半透明，露出下面的肌肉和血管结。更糟糕的是，里面还能看到像蜘蛛一样的小昆虫。这些昆虫通体雪白，像冰一样闪闪发光。然而，这些受到影响的人却无法在自己或他人身上看到这样的现象，仅仅是偶尔抱怨四肢刺痛而已。其中一部分人被当成了变种人，遭到杀害，而剩下的人在舰船返回真实世界之后恢复了原样。
languages.original_text: The enforcers from different decks of the von Valancius vessel report a terrifying sight: the skin of some crew members has become translucent, revealing knots of muscle and blood vessels beneath. Worse yet, small spider-like insects were seen scurrying inside of them, snow-white and sparkling like ice. The transformed could not see this phenomenon in themselves or anyone else, only occasionally complaining about a prickly feeling in their extremities. Some were branded as mutants and killed. The survivors reverted back after the vessel emerged in realspace.

traits.locale_text: 舰船多层甲板的镇压者都报告了同样可怕的景象：某些船员的皮肤变得半透明，露出下面的肌肉和血管结。更糟糕的是，里面还能看到像蜘蛛一样的小昆虫。这些昆虫通体雪白，像冰一样闪闪发光。然而，这些受到影响的人却无法在自己或他人身上看到这样的现象，仅仅是偶尔抱怨四肢刺痛而已。其中一部分人被当成了变种人，遭到杀害，而剩下的人在舰船返回真实世界之后恢复了原样。

languages.text: Los vigilantes de las distintas cubiertas de la nave von Valancius nos informan de un espectáculo aterrador: la piel de algunos miembros de la tripulación se ha vuelto translúcida, mostrando nudos de músculos y vasos sanguíneos. Y lo que es peor, se han visto pequeños insectos parecidos a arañas correteando en su interior, blancos como la nieve y brillantes como el hielo. Los transformados no podían ver este fenómeno en sí mismos ni en nadie, y solo se quejaban ocasionalmente de pinchazos en las extremidades. Algunos fueron marcados como mutantes y asesinados. Los supervivientes volvieron a su estado natural cuando la nave emergió en el espacio real.
languages.original_text: The enforcers from different decks of the von Valancius vessel report a terrifying sight: the skin of some crew members has become translucent, revealing knots of muscle and blood vessels beneath. Worse yet, small spider-like insects were seen scurrying inside of them, snow-white and sparkling like ice. The transformed could not see this phenomenon in themselves or anyone else, only occasionally complaining about a prickly feeling in their extremities. Some were branded as mutants and killed. The survivors reverted back after the vessel emerged in realspace.

traits.locale_text: Los vigilantes de las distintas cubiertas de la nave von Valancius nos informan de un espectáculo aterrador: la piel de algunos miembros de la tripulación se ha vuelto translúcida, mostrando nudos de músculos y vasos sanguíneos. Y lo que es peor, se han visto pequeños insectos parecidos a arañas correteando en su interior, blancos como la nieve y brillantes como el hielo. Los transformados no podían ver este fenómeno en sí mismos ni en nadie, y solo se quejaban ocasionalmente de pinchazos en las extremidades. Algunos fueron marcados como mutantes y asesinados. Los supervivientes volvieron a su estado natural cuando la nave emergió en el espacio real.

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウスの船に乗る様々なデッキの執行官から、恐ろしい光景を見たという報告があがっている。一部のクルーの肌が半透明になって、皮膚の下の筋肉や血管の集まりが丸見えになっているそうだ。さらに最悪なのが、小さなクモのような虫が体内でカサカサと動き、それは氷のような白雪色でキラキラしているという。体が体が変わってしまった者達は、自分自身や他の人からこの現象を確認することができず、たまに手足がチクチク痛むと不満を言うだけだった。数名は変異体の烙印を押されて始末された。船がリアルスペースに移動すると、生存者は元の姿に戻った。
languages.original_text: The enforcers from different decks of the von Valancius vessel report a terrifying sight: the skin of some crew members has become translucent, revealing knots of muscle and blood vessels beneath. Worse yet, small spider-like insects were seen scurrying inside of them, snow-white and sparkling like ice. The transformed could not see this phenomenon in themselves or anyone else, only occasionally complaining about a prickly feeling in their extremities. Some were branded as mutants and killed. The survivors reverted back after the vessel emerged in realspace.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウスの船に乗る様々なデッキの執行官から、恐ろしい光景を見たという報告があがっている。一部のクルーの肌が半透明になって、皮膚の下の筋肉や血管の集まりが丸見えになっているそうだ。さらに最悪なのが、小さなクモのような虫が体内でカサカサと動き、それは氷のような白雪色でキラキラしているという。体が体が変わってしまった者達は、自分自身や他の人からこの現象を確認することができず、たまに手足がチクチク痛むと不満を言うだけだった。数名は変異体の烙印を押されて始末された。船がリアルスペースに移動すると、生存者は元の姿に戻った。

languages.text: Les prévôts de différents ponts du von Valancius signalent un événement terrifiant : la peau de certains membres d'équipage est devenue transparente, laissant apparaître leurs muscles et vaisseaux sanguins. Pire encore, on peut apercevoir des sortes de petites araignées d'un blanc étincelant grouiller à l'intérieur de leurs corps. Les personnes affectées semblent ne pas pouvoir constater le phénomène par elles-mêmes, mais se plaignent occasionnellement de légers picotements aux extrémités. Certaines victimes sont qualifiées de mutantes et abattues, les autres voient leur affliction disparaître dès l'entrée dans l'espace réel.
languages.original_text: The enforcers from different decks of the von Valancius vessel report a terrifying sight: the skin of some crew members has become translucent, revealing knots of muscle and blood vessels beneath. Worse yet, small spider-like insects were seen scurrying inside of them, snow-white and sparkling like ice. The transformed could not see this phenomenon in themselves or anyone else, only occasionally complaining about a prickly feeling in their extremities. Some were branded as mutants and killed. The survivors reverted back after the vessel emerged in realspace.

traits.locale_text: Les prévôts de différents ponts du von Valancius signalent un événement terrifiant : la peau de certains membres d'équipage est devenue transparente, laissant apparaître leurs muscles et vaisseaux sanguins. Pire encore, on peut apercevoir des sortes de petites araignées d'un blanc étincelant grouiller à l'intérieur de leurs corps. Les personnes affectées semblent ne pas pouvoir constater le phénomène par elles-mêmes, mais se plaignent occasionnellement de légers picotements aux extrémités. Certaines victimes sont qualifiées de mutantes et abattues, les autres voient leur affliction disparaître dès l'entrée dans l'espace réel.

languages.text: Die Enforcer verschiedener Decks des Valancius-Schiffs berichten von einem furchterregenden Anblick: Die Haut einiger Crewmitglieder ist durchsichtig geworden und gibt den Blick auf Muskelstränge und Blutgefäße darunter frei. Schlimmer noch, kleine spinnenähnliche Insekten wuseln unter der Haut herum, schneeweiß und glitzernd wie Eis. Die Verwandelten konnten dieses Phänomen weder bei sich selbst noch bei jemand anderem sehen, sie beschwerten sich nur gelegentlich über ein Kribbeln in ihren Extremitäten. Manche wurden als Mutanten gebrandmarkt und getötet. Die Überlebenden verwandelten sich wieder zurück, als das Schiff zurück in den Realraum kam.
languages.original_text: The enforcers from different decks of the von Valancius vessel report a terrifying sight: the skin of some crew members has become translucent, revealing knots of muscle and blood vessels beneath. Worse yet, small spider-like insects were seen scurrying inside of them, snow-white and sparkling like ice. The transformed could not see this phenomenon in themselves or anyone else, only occasionally complaining about a prickly feeling in their extremities. Some were branded as mutants and killed.
